title: How hard is the life of a rock star? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wish I could ask Elvis, Lennon, Berry, Cobain, Brian Jones, and many other rockers! But some good rockers are still handing it well, look at Elton John, Bill Joel, the Stones, and of course McCartney, to name a few!
Life is what you make it . If you are a celebrity it makes things rougher. You now have fans and some want autographs. However you are paid handsomely. Stay at home with your biggest fans.
